title: unauthorized transactions
extract: If you keep a running tab on your bank account and check your transactions regularly, you may run across an unauthorized account. Usually, this is a sign that someone has stolen your debit card or they have somehow skimmed the number and have access to your checking account.Jan 16, 2019
extract_html: If you keep a running tab on your bank account and check your transactions regularly, you may run across an unauthorized account. Usually, this is a sign that someone has stolen your debit card or they have somehow skimmed the number and have access to your checking account.Jan 16, 2019
